message: If we are still doing this, I propose 6:30 pm at Just Wing'n It at 79th and Michigan. Purpose would be to chat about the 5/22 meeting, talk about tools that we could hack on to make our process better, and brainstorm ideas/approaches for next time. What is everyone's level of interest? Also, alternate location suggestions welcomed.
Also, could pre-game for Thursday's meeting with Frank (those who are going to that.)
wingnit ok?

Interest for me is still medium-high. I'd like to pre-game a bit for Thursday, but don't want to drag everyone into it. I'd also be excited about some idea generation, retrospection, and/or general discussion.
If this is happening, I'd probably make it.  I'd like to hear more about what you guys think is going to happen on Thursday, to help me decide if I'll come to that.
Wingnit is acceptable, although it seemed disproportionately loud last time. Would also be excited about Puccini's, McAlister's, or basically anything.
ok, let's try mcalister's at 86th and michigan at 6:30
Wish I could make it. I'm flying to oklahoma in 2.5 hours for my little brother's wedding
ended up staying until 9:30 or so, just talking about various things. talked about getting together somewhere consistent for X hours every Wednesday as available.
Wednesdays are the best days for me too. That sounds good
I'm starting a kickball league on Wednesdays this week, but I could probably join in late (or early, depending on the night).
they are open until 9:00, which works for me (don't want to stay up too late) we can post something to the dsv blog when we solidify this.
you using a convore phone app then? I never see you in the members online box
but then you post stuff

we need to figure out a place to meet next Wednesday night. I propose 6:00 at the Panera near 86th and township (http://maps.google.com/maps/place?cid=13350916212882941180&q=panera+near+86th+and+township,+indianapolis&hl=en&sll=39.912441,-86.212765&sspn=0.006295,0.021416&ie=UTF8&ll=39.915398,-86.221583&spn=0,0&t=h&z=16)
they are open until 9:00, which works for me (don't want to stay up too late)
I'm in
sry for double post, internet is flaky. thanks for letting me know you're in!
I'm using phone + Chrome plugin + website -- currently phone
sweet
6pm  at panera sounds good to me
That works for me
